attributes.additional_details:
All sexual related child killers face capital punishment by death,  weather already been served sentence or found guilty past and present.

To deter and help defenceless children. By dealing with these evil acts and not make this people a burden on the tax payers.
Be excluded from there  human rights as they have shown none in there acts..
There needs to be stronger deterrent after recent cases show that prison sentences does not deter these people and making our country a safer place for our defenceless children whom are vulnerable and unable to defend them selves against pedophile killers.
